structure.unit: GENERAL PROVISIONS AS TO OFFICES AND OFFICERS -- SOCIAL SECURITY FOR PUBLIC EMPLOYEES -- EMPLOYEES RETIREMENT SYSTEM

law.text: KRS 61.900 to 61.926 may be cited as "The Special Law Enforcement Officer Act."
law.history: Amended 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 188, sec. 21, effective July 15, 1980. -- Created 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 178, sec. 1, effective January 1, 1977.
